00025 // the constructor
00026 Port::Port(QDomNode &portNode): 
00027 nameGroup_(portNode), 
00028 portType_(General::WIRE),
00029 wire_(),
00030 transactional_(),
00031 portAccessHandle_(), 
00032 portAccessType_() {
00033 
00034         for (int i = 0; i < portNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00035                 QDomNode tempNode = portNode.childNodes().at(i);
00036 
00037                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:wire")) {
00038                         portType_ = General::WIRE;
00039                         wire_ = QSharedPointer<Wire>(new Wire(tempNode));
00040                 }
00041                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:transactional")) {
00042                         portType_ = General::TRANSACTIONAL;
00043                         transactional_ = QSharedPointer<Transactional>(
00044                                         new Transactional(tempNode));
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 // get the portAccessHandle and portAccessType elements
00048                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:access")) {
00049                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00050 
00051                                 if (tempNode.childNodes().at(j).nodeName() ==
00052                                                 QString("spirit:portAccessHandle")) {
00053                                         portAccessHandle_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(j).childNodes().
00054                                                         at(0).nodeValue();
00055                                 }
00056 
00057                                 else if (tempNode.childNodes().at(j).nodeName() ==
00058                                                 QString("spirit:portAccessType")) {
00059                                         portAccessType_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(j).childNodes().
00060                                                         at(0).nodeValue();
00061                                 }
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064         }
00065 
00066         if (nameGroup_.name_.isNull()) {
00067                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00068                                 "spirit:port"));
00069         }
00070 
00071         if (!transactional_ && !wire_) {
00072                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("No wire or transactional elements "
00073                                 "found in spirit:port"));
00074         }
00075         return;
00076 }

00081 Port::Port(QString const& name, Port const& other): 
00082 nameGroup_(), portType_(other.portType_),
00083 wire_(), 
00084 transactional_(other.transactional_),
00085 portAccessHandle_(other.portAccessHandle_),
00086 portAccessType_(other.portAccessType_) {
00087         
00088         nameGroup_.name_ = name;
00089 
00090     if (other.wire_ != 0) {
00091         wire_ = QSharedPointer<Wire>(new Wire(*other.wire_));
00092     }
00093 }

00095 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00098 Port::Port(const Port &other): 
00099 nameGroup_(other.nameGroup_), 
00100 portType_(other.portType_),
00101 wire_(),
00102 transactional_(),
00103 portAccessHandle_(other.portAccessHandle_),
00104 portAccessType_(other.portAccessType_) {
00105         
00106         if (other.wire_) {
00107                 wire_ = QSharedPointer<Wire>(new Wire(*other.wire_));
00108         }
00109 
00110         if (other.transactional_) {
00111                 transactional_ = QSharedPointer<Transactional>(
00112                         new Transactional(*other.transactional_.data()));
00113         }
00114 }

00116 
00117 Port & Port::operator=( const Port &other ) {
00118         if (this != &other) {
00119                 nameGroup_ = other.nameGroup_;
00120                 portType_ = other.portType_;
00121                 portAccessHandle_ = other.portAccessHandle_;
00122                 portAccessType_ = other.portAccessType_;
00123 
00124                 if (other.wire_) {
00125                         wire_ = QSharedPointer<Wire>(
00126                                 new Wire(*other.wire_.data()));
00127                 }
00128                 else
00129                         wire_ = QSharedPointer<Wire>();
00130 
00131                 if (other.transactional_) {
00132                         transactional_ = QSharedPointer<Transactional>(
00133                                 new Transactional(*other.transactional_.data()));
00134                 }
00135                 else
00136                         transactional_ = QSharedPointer<Transactional>();
00137         }
00138         return *this;
00139 }

00199 void Port::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer, const QStringList& viewNames) {
00200         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:port");
00201 
00202         // if mandatory name is missing
00203         if (nameGroup_.name_.isEmpty()) {
00204                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00205                                 "spirit:port"));
00206         }
00207         else {
00208                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", nameGroup_.name_);
00209         }
00210 
00211         if (!nameGroup_.displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00212                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", nameGroup_.displayName_);
00213         }
00214 
00215         if (!nameGroup_.description_.isEmpty()) {
00216                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", nameGroup_.description_);
00217         }
00218 
00219         // write the port type element (spirit:wire or spirit:transactional)
00220         switch (portType_) {
00221         case General::WIRE: {
00222                 if (wire_) {
00223                         wire_->write(writer, viewNames);
00224                 }
00225                 else {
00226                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Port type defined as wire but not"
00227                                         " instantiated in spirit:port"));
00228                 }
00229                 break;
00230         }
00231         case General::TRANSACTIONAL: {
00232                 if (transactional_) {
00233                         transactional_->write(writer);
00234                 }
00235                 else {
00236                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Port type defined as transactional"
00237                                         " but not instantiated in spirit:port"));
00238                 }
00239                 break;
00240         }
00241         default: {
00242                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Invalid port type in spirit:port"));
00243                 break;
00244         }
00245         }
00246 
00247         // if either of the optional elements is defined
00248         if (!portAccessHandle_.isEmpty() || !portAccessType_.isEmpty()) {
00249                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:access");
00250 
00251                 if (!portAccessType_.isEmpty()) {
00252                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:portAccessType", portAccessType_);
00253                 }
00254 
00255                 if (!portAccessHandle_.isEmpty()) {
00256                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:portAccessHandle",
00257                                         portAccessHandle_);
00258                 }
00259 
00260                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:access
00261         }
00262 
00263         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:port
00264 }

00266 void Port::setTransactional(Transactional *transactional) {
00267         // delete the old transactional if one exists
00268         if (wire_) {
00269                 wire_.clear();
00270         }
00271 
00272         // delete the old wire if one exists
00273         if (transactional_) {
00274                 transactional_.clear();
00275         }
00276         // change the port type
00277         portType_ = General::TRANSACTIONAL;
00278 
00279         transactional_ = QSharedPointer<Transactional>(transactional);
00280 }

00342 int Port::getLeftBound() const {
00343 
00344         // if the port is not wire-type
00345         if (!wire_) {
00346                 return 0;
00347         }
00348 
00349         // if the wire has a vector defined
00350         if (wire_->getVector()) {
00351                 return wire_->getVector()->getLeft();
00352         }
00353 
00354         // no vector so bound is 0
00355         return 0;
00356 }
00357 
00358 int Port::getRightBound() const {
00359 
00360         // if the port is not wire-type
00361         if (!wire_) {
00362                 return 0;
00363         }
00364 
00365         // if the wire has a vector defined
00366         if (wire_->getVector()) {
00367                 return wire_->getVector()->getRight();
00368         }
00369 
00370         // no vector so bound is 0
00371         return 0;
00372 }
00373 
00374 int Port::getPortSize() const {
00375         return (getLeftBound() - getRightBound() +1);
00376 }

00378 QString Port::getDefaultValue() const {
00379         if (!wire_) {
00380                 return QString();
00381         }
00382         return wire_->getDefaultDriverValue();

00384 
00385 void Port::setDefaultValue( const QString& defaultValue ) {
00386 
00387         if (wire_)
00388                 wire_->setDefaultDriverValue(defaultValue);
00389 
00390         // transactional does not have default value
00391         else if (transactional_)
00392                 return;
00393 
00394         else {
00395                 wire_ = QSharedPointer<Wire>(new Wire());
00396                 wire_->setDefaultDriverValue(defaultValue);
00397                 portType_ = General::WIRE;
00398         }
00399 }

00416 bool Port::isValid() const {
00417 
00418         if (nameGroup_.name_.isEmpty())
00419                 return false;
00420 
00421         // if port is type wire but the element is not defined.
00422         if (portType_ == General::WIRE && !wire_)
00423                 return false;
00424 
00425         // if port is type transactional but element is not defined.
00426         if (portType_ == General::TRANSACTIONAL && !transactional_)
00427                 return false;
00428 
00429         if (wire_)
00430                 return wire_->isValid();
00431 
00432         return true;
00433 
00434 }
00435 
00436 void Port::setDirection( General::Direction direction ) {
00437 
00438         // if wire has been specified
00439         if (wire_)
00440                 wire_->setDirection(direction);
00441 
00442         // if neither is specified then create a new wire element
00443         else {
00444                 wire_ = QSharedPointer<Wire>(new Wire());
00445                 portType_ = General::WIRE;
00446                 wire_->setDirection(direction);
00447         }
00448 }

00480 void Port::setAllLogicalDirectionsAllowed( bool allowed ) {
00481 
00482         if (wire_)
00483                 wire_->setAllLogicalDirectionsAllowed(allowed);
00484 
00485         else if (transactional_)
00486                 transactional_->setAllLogicalInitiativesAllowed(allowed);
00487 
00488         else {
00489                 wire_ = QSharedPointer<Wire>(new Wire());
00490                 wire_->setAllLogicalDirectionsAllowed(allowed);
00491                 portType_ = General::WIRE;
00492         }

00544 bool Port::hasType( const QString& viewName /*= QString("")*/ ) const {

00551 
00552 void Port::useDefaultVhdlTypes() {
00553         // if theres no wire definition
00554         if (!wire_) {
00555                 wire_ = QSharedPointer<Wire>(new Wire());
00556                 portType_ = General::WIRE;
00557         }
00558 
00559         int size = getPortSize();
00560         QString typeName;
00561 
00562         // use std_logic for scalar ports
00563         if (size <= 1) {
00564                 typeName = QString("std_logic");
00565         }
00566         // use std_logic_vector for vectored ports
00567         else {
00568                 typeName = QString("std_logic_vector");
00569         }
00570 
00571         wire_->setTypeName(typeName);
00572 
00573         // set the default type definition
00574         wire_->setTypeDefinition(typeName, QString("IEEE.std_logic_1164.all"));
00575 
00576 }
